headline: Blackstone Energy Transition Partners to Acquire Potomac Energy Center
summary: LOUDOUN COUNTY, Va. & NEW YORK, January 24, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) announced today that Blackstone Energy Transition Partners ("Blackstone") have agreed to acquire Potomac Energy Center ("Potomac"), a 774-megawatt natural gas power plant in Loudoun County, Virginia.
